keyRedFlag: Toxicity (Halos around lights); Low K increases risk
Headache; Keep in original glass bottle
GI upset (Take w/ food); Lactic Acidosis
Hypoglycemia; Only insulin for IV use
Hypoglycemia; Do not mix in syringe
Low Mg; C. diff; Fracture risk
Pregnancy Cat X; Folic acid needed
Inject outer thigh; Seek ER after
Dry mouth; Do not swallow capsule
